title: Content and Language Integrated Learning (CLIL)-Based Social Studies Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and elementary foreign language proficiency
context.additional_context: Learner role: student, domain expertise: beginner, technological environment: digital devices provided, assessment method: summative assessment-centered.

learning_goals: Learners can explain social studies content in a foreign language (English/French) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can apply 70% or more of language correction feedback provided in reflective sessions to their final presentations.
Learners can design social problem-solving models in a foreign language (English/French) with peers using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
